text: Barbara Nimri Aziz (2009) Barbara Nimri Aziz is an anthropologist, writer and journalist based in New York, USA. She is best known for her efforts in the establishment of the Arab American literary community support group RAWI in the United States and her pioneering academic research on Yogmaya Neupane in Nepal. She also worked as a producer at WBAI Radio in New York. ==Selected works== * * * * ==References== Category:American women non-fiction writers Category:21st-century American non-fiction writers Category:21st- century American women writers Category:American anthropologists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Barbara Nimri Aziz
